title: SMC_TRAFO_5Axes (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFO_5Axes
Reverse transformation, computes the axis positions
so that the tool center point (TCP) achieves the
desired path position and orientation.

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment:
Set position: Contains the path position in the
variables dX, dY, dZ and the orientation of the
tool in dB (Inclination) and dC (Azimuth).

rows.Name: dx
rows.Comment: Set position of TCP for axis x

rows: Set position of TCP for axis y
Set position of TCP for axis z
Set position of TCP for inclination axis [degrees]
Set position of TCP for azimuth axis [degrees]
